sources.title: Police Story 2 (1988) Jackie Chan | Fighting crime has never been this explosive
sources.description:
The Hong Kong supercop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers, while the villains of Police Story (1985) are out for revenge.

Original title: 警察故事續集 (Ging chaat goo si juk jaap)
Alternative titles: Police Story Part II, Kowloon's Eye, Police Force II.

Director: Jackie Chan.
Writers: Jackie Chan, Edward Tang.

Main cast:
Jackie Chan – Chan Ka-Kui / Kevin Chan 
Maggie Cheung – May 
Chor Yuen – Chu Tao 
Bill Tung – Inspector Bill Wong 
Lam Kwok-Hung – Chief Inspector Raymond Li
Charlie Cho – John Ko 

Genres: Martial Arts, Action, Dark Comedy, Slapstick, Crime, Thriller
Release date: August 20, 1988 (Hong Kong).
Filming location: Hong Kong

NEXT: Police Story 3: Supercop (1992) https://youtu.be/qIDFvWX0wvE


Availability varies by region
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdbtxZGahjOpER2huEhTG9Rb

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Despite his success at apprehending criminals, Kevin Chan's unorthodox approach to his work as a police officer sees him demoted to the traffic branch. Despite this, the man he put behind bars is now out of prison, and has vowed to make his life a misery. While this crime boss his harassing Kevin and his girlfriend, the police are contemplating reinstating Kevin to help them fight a group of bombers attempting to extort $10 million from building owners.
metadata.Writer: Jackie Chan, Paul B. Clay, Edward Tang
metadata.Actors: Jackie Chan, Maggie Cheung, Kwok-Hung Lam
